(Simplified: 阚)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 敢 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 敢 [ gǎn ] bold, brave; to dare, to venture
①望。
②姓氏。

闞字的基本解释

闞
kàn

闞
hǎn
均见“阚”。

闞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàn］
［《廣韻》苦濫切，去闞，溪。］
“監3”的被通假字。“阚1”的繁体字。
(1)望；远看。
(2)探望，看望。
(3)临。
(4)通“嵌”。
(5)古地名。在今山东省汶上县。
(6)姓。春秋齐有阚止。见《左传·哀公六年》。
[②]［hǎn］
［《廣韻》火斬切，上豏，曉。］
［《廣韻》許鑑切，去鑑，曉。］
“阚2”的繁体字。亦作“鬫1”。
(1)虎怒貌；虎叫声。
(2)阔大。
(3)大声。

闞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　闞； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1341第21
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦濫切，音瞰。【說文】望也。　又【博雅】闞，視也。　又【玉篇】臨也。　又【廣韻】魯邑。【左傳·昭二十五年】叔孫昭子如闞。【註】闞，魯邑。【穀梁傳·昭三十二年】公在乾侯取闞。　又亭名。【後漢·郡國志】東平陸，六國時曰平陸，有闞亭。　又姓。【史記·齊太公世家】闞止有寵焉。　又【集韻】【韻會】?虎檻切，音㺖。虎聲。【詩·大雅】闞如虓虎。【傳】闞然如虎之怒。【釋文】火斬反。【前漢·敘傳】於是七雄虓闞。　又【廣韻】【集韻】許鑒切【韻會】胡懺切【正韻】胡監切，?音㒈。【廣韻】犬聲。【集韻】獸怒聲。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?虎覽切，音喊。義同。

Kan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kàn］
["Guangyun" cuts bitterly, go to Kan, Xi. ]
"Monitoring 3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "阚1".
(1) Look; see from afar.
(2) Visit, visit.
(3) Pro.
(4) Through "embedded".
(5) Ancient place names. In today's Wenshang County, Shandong Province.
(6) Last name. The spring and autumn seasons have Kanzhi. See "Zuo Zhuan·Ai Gong Six Years".
[②]［hǎn］
["Guangyun" Fire cuts and cuts, Shangfeng, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Jianqie, go to Jian, Xiao. ]
Traditional characters for "阚2". Also known as "鬫1".
(1) Tiger's angry appearance; tiger's cry.
(2) Broad.
(3) Loudly.
Kan

[Xu Ji 1] [Men Zi Department] 　 Kan; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: Page 1341, 21
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Positive Rhyme]? Suffering and cutting, the sound can be seen. [Said Wen] Wang Ye.　[Bo Ya] Kan, Shi Ye.　[Jade articles] Lin Ye.　[Guangyun] Luyi again. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-five Years of Zhao] Uncle Sun Zhaozi Rukan. [Note] Kan, Lu Yi. [Guliang Chuan·Thirty-two Years of Zhao] The public stayed in Ganhou to take Kan.　 Also named as a pavilion. [Han Dynasty·Jun Guo Zhi] Dongping Lu was called Ping Lu in the Six Kingdoms, with Kanting.　Another last name. 【Historical Records·The Family of Prince Qi's Family】Kan Zhi has a pet.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Tiger threshold cut, sound 㺖. Tiger sound. 【Poetry·Daya】Kan Ru Feihu. [Biography] Kan Ran is like a tiger's fury. [Explanation] Huo Zhananti. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] So Qixiong Fengque.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Xu Jianqie [Rhyme Meeting] Hu Zhenqie [Zheng Yun] Hu Jianqie,? Yin 㒈. [Guang Yun] The sound of dogs. [Jiyun] The sound of beast anger.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Tiger read and cut, shouting. The same meaning.
